findings.title: Path traversal not prevented
findings.description: File path validation may not prevent directory traversal attacks
findings.recommendation: Use Path.resolve() and check if result is within allowed directory

findings.title: HTTP URL used instead of HTTPS
findings.description: Found non-HTTPS URL in API call or configuration
findings.recommendation: Use HTTPS for all external API calls

findings.title: Consider automated vulnerability scanning
findings.description: Use tools like safety or pip-audit for CVE detection
findings.recommendation: Add to CI/CD: pip install safety && safety check

findings.title: Database file readable by others
findings.description: app.db has overly permissive read permissions

findings.title: Potential sensitive data in logs
findings.description: Logging statement may include passwords, tokens, or keys
findings.recommendation: Sanitize sensitive data before logging or use DEBUG level
